What's New in 1.0.2

  • 🧠 Complete SSVEP Implementation: Visual stimulus generator with real-time focus simulation and performance tracking
  • ⚡ Advanced Event System: Time-based event triggering and complex scenario scripting with modern UI
  • 🌐 Enhanced Connectivity: Multi-protocol API support (TCP, MQTT, HTTP) with real-time data streaming
  • 📊 Research-Grade Data Export: Multiple export formats with comprehensive metadata and performance analytics
  • 🔧 Signal Processing: Advanced filtering, artifact detection, and spectral analysis tools
  • 🎯 Modern UI/UX: Complete interface redesign with drag-and-drop functionality and real-time feedback
  • 📚 10+ Sample Projects: Comprehensive SSVEP demos showcasing full app integration
  • 🏥 Healthcare Applications: Clinical research, rehabilitation, and diagnostic tools
  • 🎮 Consumer & Gaming: Interactive entertainment and brain fitness applications
  • 🏭 Industrial Use Cases: Human-machine interfaces and safety monitoring systems

Performance Improvements: Sub-10ms latency, multi-channel support (1-64), and scalable architecture for research to production workflows.
